alert.note: Alert for Delta; Dickinson; Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 4:16PM EDT until August 25 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dickinson County in south central Upper Michigan... West central Delta County in south central Upper Michigan... Northeastern Menominee County in south central Upper Michigan... * Until 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/. * At 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over Foster City, or 16 miles northeast of Iron Mountain, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Felch, Powers, Hermansville, Foster City, La Branche, Wilson, Spalding, Whitney, Schaeffer, Hardwood, and Cunard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
